attributes.action: Make all Crown and Government properties and events anywhere  alcohol free.
attributes.additional_details: The Government has a duty of care to those working on & visiting Crown/Government estates & events. As such the Chief Medical Officers advice on drinking limits should be rigorously adhered to & enforced at all times. To not take such action would show a reckless disregard for the health of those in the employ of her Majesty or attending Government events, & would undermine both the authority of the chief medical officer & the work being done to tackle the problems caused by alcohol consumption.
attributes.background: Given the new advice on alcohol, that there is no safe limit, all Crown and Government buildings and events should be alcohol free, alternatively any alcohol subsidy should be removed & the new limits, including recommendations on days of abstention and a daily limit of 3 drinks be strictly enforced

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the refreshments provided at royal events.

We could accept a petition calling for alcohol to be banned at all Government events.
